title: Enhanced spread imports resolution with re-exports and parent directory support

implementation.approach: Modified parse_imports() to handle directory imports with index.ts re-exports and added support for parent directory imports (../) for version-specific files

test_results.notes: Tested with Elasticsearch (1→35 props), Stripe (1→53 props), Notion (4→59 props). All spread imports now resolve correctly including re-exports and parent directory patterns.
